title: Slash-Friction
description: What IS a horror movie? Bryan's list of 100 horror movies is all about content. His friend Jay says it's all about the audience's reaction. Who is the master of the macabre? Only one justice of the deceased can decide!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
